entry.title: The Kendall Calendar
entry.summary:
Author: Jvp1t3rthyf4g

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,776Chapters: 14/14Kudos: 32

Summary: Maddie's eyes widen as she sees a face shes tried so hard to forget. Even worse is the fact that her boyfriend is just casually chatting with him, as if he hadn't helped her through panic attacks because of him."Mads, you okay?" Her brother's voice echoes through her head."Please tell me I'm not hallucinating, Buck." She whispers so quiet, Buck almost doesn't hear her. she points at the man. The husband she had left, escaped, just chatting with her new partner."Is that... Doug?"

entry.title: I know they're losing (and I'll pay for my place by the ring)
entry.summary:
Author: funnyfeelingbuckley

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,426Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 54

Summary: It started as an outlet, at first. A way to let out his anger in a controlled manner, with a willing opponent who would offer him the pain that he deserved. He felt itchy. Teen pregnancy in a Catholic household had cloaked him with such a thick layer of shame that he needed a way to forget. It was a good thing, he tells himself. It was an honest thing - born out of good intentions. Until it wasn't. - Or Instead of enlisting in the military, Eddie makes money via an underground fight club in Texas. After threats against his family are leveled, Eddie finds a way to Los Angeles with the help of Athena Grant. Now working as private security, he begins working for Evan "Buck" Buckley, an arrogant and hot-headed singer/songwriter who may just give Eddie Diaz a run for his money. Â  title based on I Bet On Losing Dogs by Mitski

Is that code for something? â€œThis priest told me that all this time Iâ€™ve been picking water over juice,â€ Eddie clarifies. â€œNot because I donâ€™t like juice. I actually love juice. Crave it. But I pick water over it because itâ€™s safer.â€ â€œI donâ€™t understand. Is it because waterâ€™s cheaper?â€ â€œNo, not that. I guess Iâ€™ve just been trying toâ€“ You know, lean into my desire for juice. Except, I tried, tonight, and while I did enjoy it, it still wasnâ€™tâ€“ Exactly the kind of juice Iâ€™m looking for.â€ Buck is so, so lost. â€œMaybe you should consider a different brand?â€ â€œWhat?â€ â€œLike, say you love juice with pulp,â€ Buck carries on. â€œBut so far, youâ€™ve only tried clear, liquid juice. Maybe you tasted juice with pulp when you were a kid, and have been looking for it since. Maybe youâ€™re looking for something, I donâ€™t know, familiar? entry.title: Un-Buck-ling His Chastity Belt
entry.summary:
Author: mythicalinker

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,034Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 20

Summary: "Sweetheart, look who I found lurking at our door." Jade ran her hands over Zane's broad shoulders, her fingers sinking into his hair. Zane turned his head, a smirk playing at his lips as he caught sight of Buck standing there, his cock jutting out obscenely. But Buck's eyes weren't on Zane. No, his gaze was riveted to the man kneeling between Zane's spread thighs. The man with his head bowed over Zane's lap, his dark brown hair a perfect compliment to Zane's tanned skin. It took a moment for Buck's brain to process what he was seeing, but when it did, his eyes widened in shock. "Eddie?" Buck blurted out, his voice echoing in the spacious bedroom. His heart clenched painfully in his chest as he stared at his straight best friend, his coworker, his... his secret crush. What the hell was Eddie doing here, sucking off Zane like it was the most natural thing in the world? --- Or Buck would like to simply hook up with Zane and Jade, but imagine his shock when he found Eddie there.
